value.description: Tigrayan forces have destroyed the airport serving a town claimed by Ethiopia as one of the world's oldest centers of Christianity. David Doyle reports.

value.name: India turns to ex-army medics as COVID-19 surges
value.description: India's defense ministry says it will recruit former army medics to support its overwhelmed healthcare system, as COVD-19 cases and deaths continue to surge, and amid angry calls for a nationwide lockdown. David Doyle has more

value.name: A chilly start for the French Open
value.description: With fewer spectators and drizzly weather the French Open - starting in September due to the coronavirus pandemic, got off to an underwhelming start on Sunday. David Doyle reports.
